originalText.text: Extremely helpful and friendly staff. I got the 12 lesson package and loved every lesson. I went from a nervous beginner with no prior driving experience to a really comfortable driver. I highly recommend this school.

text.text: Extremely helpful and friendly staff. I got the 12 lesson package and loved every lesson. I went from a nervous beginner with no prior driving experience to a really comfortable driver. I highly recommend this school.

originalText.text: Thank you all, Martha you will be in my head every time im trying to parallel park. I appreciate all you did for me !!! Thank you for being patient, supporting me letting me know what I need to work on. I officially passed!! 12/2023 right before the new years !! Also to the instructor who helped taking me to my test you answered some questions and made me feel confident. Great school great staff.

originalText.text: Here’s Harlem driving school, illegally parked in front of their own business, blocking a bike lane and putting vulnerable road users at risk. The only review you need to see. Awful behaviour, and not somewhere anyone should be learning to drive.

text.text: Here’s Harlem driving school, illegally parked in front of their own business, blocking a bike lane and putting vulnerable road users at risk. The only review you need to see. Awful behaviour, and not somewhere anyone should be learning to drive.

originalText.text: One of the best driving schools, if not the best in Manhattan! So easy to get to by walking (as I live nearby).I went to two other driving schools prior to this one, and the professionalism shown here is incredible! Even Mr. Sall (the 5 hour instructor) gave us pointers. Today I passed my road test (just barely) and I had Martha as my teacher from this school. I'm so thankful to her and the receptionist (Mari) for correcting all my bad habits. Don't be fooled by the little waiting room! You'll be glad you went, trust me!

originalText.text: So far I only done 3 classes and it's great . She is very nice and teach you so you can understand exactly what is needed to learn I have 4 more sessions to go in I'm excited about it .
